body_content.explanation: a type of round, flat chocolate cake, originally from Austria. It is made in two layers with a thin layer of apricot jam in between them, and is covered in chocolate icing (= a sweet mixture made from sugar and butter):
examples: If you go to Vienna, you must try the famous Sacher torte.
We shared a slice of Sachertorte served with whipped cream.
The Sacher Tortes and other famous desserts in the cafe were too expensive.
